scripts.install-all: npm --prefix backend install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix frontend install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix websocket install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix backend run prisma:generate
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev" "npm --prefix websocket run start"
scripts.prod: npm --prefix backend run prisma:generate && npm run build-frontend && concurrently "npm --prefix backend run start" "npm --prefix frontend run start" "npm --prefix websocket run start"
